nodes.text: A Force talisman, also known as a dark side talisman when associated with the dark side of the Force, was an item that was imbued with the Force by a Force adept. The imbued item was usually of personal significance to the adept and could be used to protect the adept from other Force users. Komari Vosa, a former Jedi and the leader of the Bando Gora, had a Force talisman. Some members of the Wyrd, a group of dark side Tarasin witches from the planet Cularin, including the senior witch Xinishia, carried Force talismans.
